physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Dysarthric speech, difficulty in hearing, gait difficulties, sixth nerve palsy, 'astasia-abasia' gait.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Slight improvement in speech and gait; however, dysarthria did not remit.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: During hospitalization, improved speech fluency and gait with hypnosis; dysarthria and awkward hand posturing remained nearly in full remission.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptoms improved during hypnosis, including better speech and gait.
